solution_line_template: Mary currently has {cherry_cupcakes} cherry + {berry_cupcakes} berry cupcakes = <<{cherry_cupcakes}+{berry_cupcakes}={current_cupcakes}>>{current_cupcakes} cupcakes.
Mary needs an additional {total_needed_cupcakes} cupcakes - {current_cupcakes} = <<{total_needed_cupcakes}-{current_cupcakes}={additional_cupcakes_needed}>>{additional_cupcakes_needed} cupcakes.

Mary wants to split that number evenly between chocolate and vanilla, so {additional_cupcakes_needed} / {number_of_flavors_to_split} = <<{additional_cupcakes_needed}/{number_of_flavors_to_split}={cupcakes_per_flavor}>>{cupcakes_per_flavor} cupcakes of each flavor.
